description.title: Letterboxd 500 most watched movies of all time
subtitle: Updated as of: June 29th, 2025
Hope you all enjoy and let me know if a movie is missing :)
Percentage watched by me: 56%.
* Barbie is #1 with 5,52M views
* Hotel Transylvania is #500 with 1,08M views
Monthly changes:
* Sinners (#331) and Grave of the Fireflies (#495) are new on this list. Ford v Ferrari and Dirty Dancing are out
* Conclave (+63), Mickey 17 (+55) and Lilo & Stitch (+16) gained the most spots
* The Irishman (-14), Birds of Prey (-13) and The Shape of Water (-12) lost the most spots
Movies that are close to an entrance:
* Last Night in Soho (1,075M views)
* 22 Jump Street (1,075M views)
* Dirty Dancing (1,074M views)
* Ford v Ferrari (1,073M views)
* Babylon (1,070M views)
Trending movies that will sooner or later be in this list:
* Final Destination (1,042M views)
* A Minecraft Movie (1,029M views)
* Thunderbolts* (974K views)
